extendedInfo.description: Your children will enjoy hours of learning and entertainment as they finger paint gorgeous, professionally-designed illustrations using a rich color palette and just those little fingers! And best of all, it's so easy to use your child will start creating without any instruction. Itâs the perfect tool to enhance your child's creativity, fine motor skills, and sense of color.Also known as Samo Coloring for Kids.FEATURES* Two types of illustrations and coloring modes:  * FILL drawings allow kids to paint different areas of an illustration just by tapping their favorite colors.   * DRAW mode lets tiny fingers paint *only* within the lines for fine motor development and beautiful final illustrations.* Swipe left or right to move between illustration sets. There are drawings with and without borders for varying artistic styles.* Comes with 3 free sets (27 professional illustrations total). More free and paid sets are available in our store and will be added regularly, so check back!* Colors are divided into palettes of 5 complementary colors to keep it simple and focus on the drawing at hand. Swipe left/right to change palettes (30 different colors in all).* Choose from full pages to color or fill in black and white drawings on a lush, painted background.* Undo/Redo mistakes.* Save to gallery to keep a record of your child's art.Why KIDS love it* Fun interface with no distractions â Â just color and create!* Large, identifiable touch areas make it easy for childish fingers.* Beautiful, professional illustrations designed just for them.* Kid-tested. Just the features they love without any confusion.Why PARENTS love it* No ads* No popups* No accidental purchasesExtra features for geeks * Vector-based, pixel-perfect images* Minimal app size* Move to SD card supportedInternet permission is used for anonymous analytics to help to enhance the app and fix issues.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome app for my daughter, she likes it very much. Would buy more kids apps from this developer if it were available. There are only few things that could make this app even better: support for multiple touches simultaneously and some kind of lock mode (so kids wont be able to swich out from app accidentaly).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Nice! Our kids like it a lot, it\'s a beautiful app with no distractions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Support awesome apps like this!
reviews.comment: The highly-polished, kid-friendly interface and base drawings make this the *very best* toddler painting program (not just one of the best).  My 2.5 year old loves it, and can easily select the drawing, palette, and colour she wants.  Try it and I think you\'ll agree that it\'s worth supporting by unlocking the extras!  (I\'m not a shill; just a happy customer. :-P ). Finally, combine this with \"Toddler Central\", by Rad Lemur, for even more win. :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Only one drawback
reviews.comment: Absolutely beautiful app, but how do you reset the drawings??

reviews.title: No ads / pop ups for kids games
reviews.comment: It drives me nuts when kids games include pop ups and ads. They don\'t know any better and can\'t always tell the difference between the ad and the game. Not for me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very pretty app.
reviews.comment: I don\'t have kids, but I\'ve colored a few things myself, and it\'s very well designed and enjoyable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty cool
reviews.comment: Great app for the rugrats especially with no ads for a freebie.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Annoying popup buttons to buy or rate
reviews.comment: Keeps asking to buy and rate in the middle of trying it. Very annoying. Only rating now before i try properly to get rid of the annoying button that keeps poping up. When i got rid of the rating button, the buy button still poped up all the time. Uninstalling now. Total pain, otherwise might have been a nice app for kids.
reviews.author: A Google User
